website_summaries.verdict: Naturally flavored with urinary system-boosting cranberries and delicious nonfat milk, this supplement is easily mixed into food as a bladder-supporting formula that cats will definitely appreciate.
pros: Cranberry extract, echinacea, vitamin C, and Oregon grape root are the first 4 ingredients
Maintains a healthy urinary and immune system
cons: Its otherwise tasty, dried nonfat milk ingredient should not be given to cats with a dairy allergy

customer_reviews.title: He was given antibiotics and was better for a minute
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old terrier mix started peeing in the house, after a trip to the vet we discovered it was a bladder infection. He was given antibiotics and was better for a minute. He has had at least six this year...he is on an exspensive urinary tract dog food, he wears a belly band now 24/7 and we were just trying to come to terms that this is how he was going to have to live for the rest of his life then I found this product. It has been a month and most mornings his belly band is dry. Yay for cranberry. I am ordering my second one now for the maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: lgs

customer_reviews.title: Thought 50g was alot bigger than this man.
customer_reviews.text: What I like is the fact that even though my female 7yr old shih tzu is a really picky eater she didn't even notice anything else beside her regular food was there so it's really easy to administer. What I didn't like and surprised me at first hand was the size of the container I was expecting something a little bigger but that's my expectation I guess plus it didn't come with a spoon or anything to measure the correct amount. We'll see if it works though that's what I care about the most.
customer_reviews.author: YNW PABELLO

customer_reviews.title: Urinary incontinence savior!
customer_reviews.text: I have two senior dogs (11 yrs, aprox 55 lbs each) who both have urinary incontinence. One of my dogs had been on Proin in the past, which worked but caused her to throw up often. I also had to force them down her throat. These treats, however, my dogs absolutely love! And they work just as good as the Proin did. No vet visits to get it is a bonus too! It's all natural, no chemicals, which is very important to me. I gave them two a day at first, for a few months, then went down to one a day and I have no issues with them peeing in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Contains dry milk, made my poor cat throw up
customer_reviews.text: Two stars because this product is what it advertises to be, but I wish I'd paid closer attention to the ingredients; along with the active ingredients, this is mostly non-fat dry milk. Why?? Of all the possible ingredients, I'm so surprised NaturVet chose milk. Typical adult cats don't really process cows' milk, the lactose upsets their stomachs. My cat threw up about 5 minutes after I gave this to her mixed with her normal cat food. Poor thing. At least I got my money back with Amazon's return policy. Your experience may vary, but this didn't work for my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie and Alex

customer_reviews.title: Boxer UTI issues
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for about 6 months and thus far no UTI's. We use these as a treat twice daily, in the AM after she goes out for the first time in early morning. PM when we are retiring for the evening 11PM ish After she does her business she comes up right away to get the treat. I highly recommend these with one exception, cost, they are expensive for us they were on sale once and I should have purchased more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: My Bullmastiff LOVES them
customer_reviews.text: A treatment for my "grand dog" she came into "season" and had some residual bleeding. The Vet suggested it might be an UTI. As a women, I've had a few UTI in my life, and know how painful they can be. So I suggested the cranberry chews. My dog, Tahlou CHEWED them all right, she would have eaten the entire container at one time if she could. So far, she seems to be improving and we are very pleased with the product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny B

customer_reviews.title: HINT: get these for your cat, too! ...
customer_reviews.text: HINT: get these for your cat, too! The cat version of these costs more, and has twice as many, but if you read the label, you have to give the cat two of the cat variety to get the same dose of the ingredients instead of just one. Our cat loves these, and gets one a day as a treat. He actually begs for them. As a kitten, he had chronic urinary tract infections, and the vet suggested we try these. He's not had a UTI since we started them. Maybe it's coincidence, but he loves them so much, we keep giving them.
customer_reviews.author: WolfSinger

customer_reviews.title: These really work!
customer_reviews.text: My senior chihuahua sometimes has frequent urination spells and accidents on the carpet which I attribute to the start of a UTI. If I notice this I always start giving her these chewable cranberry bites and it always seems to take away the issues she is having. Have been using these for a few years and they are really working. She loves the taste of them and thinks they are a treat. I would definitely recommend for dogs with frequent UTI's.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Janecek

customer_reviews.title: my sweet frenchie started urinating blood one night
customer_reviews.text: these saved me from an expensive vet visit. my sweet frenchie started urinating blood one night, it was a saturday and everything was closed untill monday. I knew she had utis in the past to that was most likely what it was this time. I ordered these for her untill we got into the vet. they are tasty treats that were so tasty, by other dog got ahold of them and ate the entire container. so, i ordered another box, and after only two doses there was no more blood in her urine and she felt much better. the vet said she was fine and to continue giving them to her .
customer_reviews.author: Nathan & Leah

customer_reviews.title: Not so much
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived and the contents seemed way to dry and old. I was going to cut them in half to give one in the morning and one in the evening but they are so dry and crumbling that it's impossible. My dogs have been taking them for a couple weeks and the female is still urinating 10 times while on a walk she is still having accidents in the house so no noticable change there either. She has already been on antibiotics so I figured this would support her immune system. Seems to do nothing but could be from the fact they seem to be very old
customer_reviews.author: robshow

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order for this product! Not sure if it’s preventing bladder infections, but feel it can’t hurt! My terrier likes them. My complaint with this last order is I could not read the expiration date, it was smeared. I called the company and was told after telling them the code on the bottle I was told the expiration date . The problem I had was the previous bottle had a later expiration date than the new one! I asked why I was getting older product and they had no answer! I really did not like the attitude of the person helping me.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dog allot
customer_reviews.text: This product helped my dogs urinary issue. She started having symptoms of a UTi, straining to pee and peeing often. Vet couldn't get us in for severeal days! After 2 days of this at recommended dosage she started peeing normal. This was a great help to get her through until we got to the vet and got her medications. I don't recommend anyone doing this if you can get into the vet, vet first always! I am not a vet and I was hoping it was a UTI, thankfully it was and it was seen the first day of discomfort and started her on this the second day of symtoms.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin Shari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I give it as a supplement for my special needs fur daughter
customer_reviews.author: Leizza

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sickly basset hound who has multiple health issues. She was drinking copious amounts of water and having to be let out constantly. After two days of this treatment, she settled down and started cutting back on on drinking and constant urinating. When I stopped giving her this supplement, she returned to her old ways. I now give her two pills every day and she has no more issues. A godsend!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Scott

customer_reviews.title: Helped my Blossom
customer_reviews.text: My pitbull had really not been herself. Laying around, not eating, had some bleeding and discharge. After some research I decided to try these hoping it was just a urinary issue and not cancer or something. After the 1st day of trying these she was more active and eating a little more. The bleeding and discharge went away and she was back to her normal self 100% within a week. I was shocked. So happy these helped my girl. **This was the only change to her diet and routine I changed. gave as directed
customer_reviews.author: LG239

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my girly :)
customer_reviews.text: I have a four year old dog that’s very prone to UTIs to the point where I was at the vet every 3 months. It was becoming a concern after a year and my vet recommended I find a cranberry vitamin. After searching Amazon for several days, I went with NaturVet. Everything has changed for my girly since then! She’s been taking her “snackies” for over a year now and has been UTI free since then. I’m now on my second bottle that will last me another year. *Just giving a disclaimer that I partnered with my vet before purchasing and I’m not making any medical claims to keep you from pursuing medical attention for your dog!*
customer_reviews.author: Seebie💕

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: We have 6 dogs who vary from 8 weeks to 9 years old. Our oldest started acting very unlike himself. He was sleeping non stop, peeing in the house, looked generally very miserable. I wanted to try these before we spent a bunch at the vet because he does have urinary issues. Within 2 days he was completely different! He was happy, playful, stopped urinating inside, and doesn’t sleep 24/7. He will be on these for the rest of his life. I feel like he just got his “pep” back!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole0923

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our dog.
customer_reviews.text: This little treat did exactly what I expected it to do. We noticed our dog was urinating frequently and it was dark in color. I thought UTI right away and ordered these treats. We gave them as directed and within a week saw improvement. Within three weeks things were back to normal. We now give these once a week to keep things right.
customer_reviews.author: J. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Good For Cats and Dogs
customer_reviews.text: After my cat had to have emergency surgery for recurring cystitis that resulted in a blockage, we overhauled everything we thought might have caused it. One of the changes was incorporating some supplements to their diet, one of which was Cranberry Extract. I give him half a scoop (included in the container) twice a week and he has been doing great since. I like that this is suitable for both cats and dogs, and these days my other cat and dog get this sprinkled in their food as well. Because I only use half a scoop at a time, one tub lasts for over six months. Do consult your vet before starting any supplement just to be safe though.
customer_reviews.author: A Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Powder
customer_reviews.text: This has been long overdue, but I wanted to add that this powder has always been a miracle for my cats, one of which is UTI prone. No amount of vet visits or antibiotics could help him, and the Vet was going to suggest survey to address the issue of constant UTI....no dice for my budget. I found this powder after reading reviews, and within a couple days, my cat had fully recovered. I've now been using this powder for him periodically, per the instructions, for years, and it's kept him healthy and held UTIs at bay. This supplement is a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: TheMan42

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like them
customer_reviews.text: The vet had told me my dog had a UTI and I bought these and got meds. After a week of both she was still wetting the bed, but another vet diagnosed incontinence and the meds worked. Sharing just in case it helps someone else. Do not know if these help UTI, but all the dogs I’ve given them to like the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs health.
customer_reviews.text: Our poor dog is highly prone to bladder infections and UTI's. She has not had one problem since we have been giving her these chews daily with her food, she gobbles them up faster than her treats. Despite the cost of having to constantly buy more cranberry chews, they are much less expensive than antibiotics, not to mention better for the dog. They are also much less emotionally expensive than UTI's and coming home from work to puddles of urine.
customer_reviews.author: Corey A Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Urinary problems
customer_reviews.text: My english bulldog got diagnosed with a uti recently and crystals in her urine. I'll update in a couple weeks when she goes in for a recheck to see if this has helped her out or not. She didnt seem to like the flavor at first and she refused to eat it. Second time around when offered she did eat it. Packaging could be a little better to prevent the supplements frim break seal and spilling all over box.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been piddling in his sleep for years. Despite bringing him to the vet for UTI's it just kept happening. I had almost given up when I decided to give these a try. They work. They really do. They tell you to give it to your dog 2-3weeks daily and then twice a week, but my dog was having the runs after a week but was no longer leaking, so I dropped him down to the maintenance and hes been doing great since. He seems to think its pretty tasty and it's easy enough to crumble over his food. So glad I tried this.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Dogs seem to love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have one pup with a sensitive urinary tract and another dog that's jealous! So they often both get these treats. They both love the taste. Have not had a UTI issue since we started using these so I think they work. They smell OK.. the other cranberry supplements we have purchased smells bad! The probiotic supplements we have currently are gross smelling too. I've found that after they've sat on the shelf for awhile, they tend to start smelling worse. We'll see!
customer_reviews.author: cristen430

customer_reviews.title: It works, cat likes it
customer_reviews.text: Took a few weeks to work but my cat stopped hissing and crying in the litter box. He had a set of antibiotics and the vet told us to wait for the urine Ph to drop with the Urinary care food. Since the food itself wasn’t working I started giving him the Cranberry Relief, but it took a few weeks to see any improvement. Now I still give him for maintenance, he likes the flavor, I mix with his wet food and a bit of water. I could sprinkle over the dry food but it leaves too much left on the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn O'Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These chews are amazing. My Boykin Spaniel has had bladder issues all of her life. She took these chews for about 3 days and I noticed a huge difference right away. She normally goes out and urinated some, then would lick that area. She would walk around the yard and squat multiple times and may express a drop or 2. Now, she goes out and does her thing in one trip and doesn't seem to be in any discomfort anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Plastic film missing
customer_reviews.text: Ok so my tying to add pictures of the product. I received these after paying $15 for my baby and the plastic film was removed or fell off and the package opened inside the box. I’m sure maybe it had to do with amazon but what concerns me is why plastic was missing. How do I know the product is fresh? The chews don’t look dark brown they loo like they had dried up or something.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend giving it a try!
customer_reviews.text: My cat was suffering from a horrible UTI. The vet put him on 3 rounds of antibiotics, which cleared it up while he was on the antibiotics, but every time he finished his antibiotics, the UTI would come right back. Then the vet suggested we try adding a cranberry supplement to my cat's diet. I read the reviews for different supplements and NaturVet Cranberry Relief Plus had the best reviews. It has been about 3 weeks, my cat is completely off of antibiotics and I have been mixing this with his food everyday. His UTI is almost completely cleared up! Like I said, it was a pretty horrible UTI so I am more than happy with the results
customer_reviews.author: Bettina

customer_reviews.title: Helped my doggie so much!
customer_reviews.text: My dog kept getting UTIs and nothing would clear it up. I bought this as a last resort when I just didn't have the money for yet another vet visit and this cleared it up in a little over a week! Amazing product... and my dog was happy to eat it when I put it on her food. This helped my dog feel better and saved me a whole bunch of money! It's been 6 months and she has not gotten another UTI! A miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah White

customer_reviews.title: Cranberry Relief Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old dog was having issues holding her urine. While she was taken out every couple hours, if she had to go she would not make it outside. The vet treated her for a urinary infection. It continued after the medication was complete. A friend recommended Cranberry Relief. It started working within a couple days. My dog hasn't had any accidents since (almost 2). They must taste good because she comes running when I pick up the container.
customer_reviews.author: Here to help

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: My adult, recently adopted dog could not house train himself for weeks until I did a little internet research and discovered it could be because of UTI or diminished kidney function. I decided to try this supplement as a last resort before taking him to the vet and the problem literally fixed itself within days. I give this to him every day now.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyBunny

customer_reviews.title: Quick change and relief
customer_reviews.text: If your dog won't take the chew, try breaking it in half. My dog wouldn't take the whole chew. I guess he liked the way it smelled inside better and would eat it if broken in half. After a couple days he stopped having frequent bathroom needs. After four days i noticed a significant change in his agitation. When he is upset he chews his paws. He is much more relaxed now. This is a product i suggest keeping in stock at home.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Relief for my furry child
customer_reviews.text: My Akita was getting bladder infections every two months, it was horrible. Since changing her food to pure meat (no starch) and giving her two of these nuggets each day her infections have ceased. I will continue to give her these chewables (which she loves by the way) as they are obviously helping! These folks had the best price around.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great for Senior Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have learned with my last three dogs. This product works great. Helps to keep kidneys flushed out and healthier on senior dogs. We all know senior dogs have accidents. If I give these to my dog, then the urine is not as yellow and is a lot easier to clean up. My dog drinks a ton of water, but I still have a hard time cleaning up an accident if I do not give these to him each day.
customer_reviews.author: GaPeach530

customer_reviews.title: Arrived open and spilt in the box
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how they taste- but they smell like dog food... the open container situation was the least appealing aspect of the delivery though.. wouldn’t order from this company again based on that.
customer_reviews.author: Someone’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Great news: clear urine without crystals
customer_reviews.text: After several trips to the vet for crystals, my 9 year old neutered male cat had a "clear" urine sample. He's a heavy cat at 15 pounds, but not over weight. I give him a one scoop dose each morning mixed in two tablespoons of "mouse warm" water with some canned food. Two years ago I switched him to a wet food diet. So far, the NaturVet Cranberry Relief has given my cat a much better life without UTI's and pain. He doesn't seem to mind the taste mixed in his food.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this when my dog had some issues with recurring urinary tract infections. I give her one with her breakfast everyday. Since that time, she has not had any more problems with that. I am very happy with this product! She has been taking them for quite some time (over a year). I think it has been very helpful with this condition.
customer_reviews.author: T.Harris

customer_reviews.title: Puppy peeing small amounts every 5-10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I don’t always write reviews, but these chews were a game changer for us. Our puppy was stopping to pee every 5-10 minutes and seemed unable to hold her bladder or empty it properly 48 hrs after taking 1 chew twice a day she seems so much better. Thank you- we have a happy puppy. I did take a urine sample to the vet and haven’t gotten the results back yet, but whatever they are the cranberry chews have helped
customer_reviews.author: Momma T

customer_reviews.title: No more UTIs
customer_reviews.text: My female puppy has had chronic UTIs due to the shape of her parts and it trapping bacteria. Prescription food was not fixing the issue. I got these cranberry bites along with PetMD antiseptic wipes and we haven't had a single UTI since! I give my 35 lb pup one bit in the morning and at night. I try to use the wipes once a day before bed or after she goes potty but I forget some days. If it stops the UTIs then it's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: Great for uti
customer_reviews.text: These have helped my English bulldog with recurring uti’s. I use these along with chlorhexidine wipes for her inverted vulva and the two together have kept us from having to see the vet for quite sometime now. I can’t attest to the flavor as she will eat almost anything but they don’t have a strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: Deena Davis

customer_reviews.title: Container was open
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the fact that the container was open and the "treats" were loose in the box when I opened it. I do not know if I want to give them to my shih tzu now. Took two stars off for that. That said, this is my second order of the stuff and it seems to help my dog make it through the night without having to go out. And yay no more accidents on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: mydandysunshine

customer_reviews.title: Tasty (according to my dog) and Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs loves these! They are one of her favorite treats! She used to have frequent urinary tract infections, and we started using these as instructed along with apple cider vinegar when needed. She has not had a problem since! When you first begin giving these to your dog, the dosage amount is higher. One container will last you for about one month. After your dog has gone through this process, one container will last you 2-3 months or more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Canine Cranberry Supplement
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing supplement for my dogs. Our dogs kept "piddling" and sometimes full out peeing on the floor. I ordered these, and after just a few treats they stopped piddling and peeing inside. They love them too! They can't wait to get them! I love how it's an all natural supplement for my pets, but they just love them period. Great job NaturVet! Thanks for great products like this. I'll continue to recommend your products to other pet owners and continue using this and the other great products you make. We also use the multivitamin supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad it works for some puppy dogs but it did ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a fourteen month old Morkie who I still have to take out every hour or he will pee on the floor. I was giving him another brand of bladder support to help his small bladder and decided to try these to save a little money. The old adage is true, you get what you pay for. This was day five of starting this brand and he had three accidents in short succession and that NEVER happens! The only thing I changed was this supplement. I’m glad it works for some puppy dogs but it did not work for mine. I asked for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Doriando Suzannah

customer_reviews.title: Not for our dog's problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to ward off UTI's which are common in older dogs. As it turned out my Corgi has multiple issues, none of which are the result of or treatable with this product. It can't hurt to give it to the dog and she loves the flavor so nobody misrepresented the product. Its OK.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Sox Wiz

customer_reviews.title: Good product, it seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: My pup deals with bladder stones so after we got them dislodged and removed we wanted to get something that would help keep them from growing again! It seems to be working as he hasn’t had any more issues of the sorts! He didn’t like the smell or taste of them so I have to Crush the cubes up and hide them in his food but that’s a small accommodation that I’m willing to make for his continued health!
customer_reviews.author: MaKayla Stewart

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these and so far so good. My sweet girl will have blood work done in a few weeks so will update afterward to see if this supplement has helped. I give it to both of my dogs every day & they love it. And they both have been peeing a little less. And I think it’s very well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He seems to feel better too. Going to continue these for a good ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog with chronic UTI issues. He will literally urinate black bloody urine. It would take weeks on expensive antibiotics to treat and then within a month or two it was back. I'm not sure it ever would fully clear up. I did a few days of antibiotics this time. It would normally take a full week to see improvement. Within 2 days of these chewables his urine is clear. Something is working. He seems to feel better too. Going to continue these for a good three weeks then cut back the dosage. Fingers crossed this is the answer to his issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bleigh

customer_reviews.title: but was amazed that the cranberry relief cleared up the infection she ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product, but it works very well! My cat had what appeared to be a urinary tract infection since she had blood in her urine. I gave her Naturvet cranberry relief and it cleared up the blood in her urine. I later found out that she had crystals in her bladder, but was amazed that the cranberry relief cleared up the infection she had which stemmed from a larger problem. I value that it is a natural supplement that is actually effective. Moreover, my cat liked the taste of the Naturvet cranberry relief. I added it to her wet food and she gobbled it up every time. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: M. Queirolo

customer_reviews.title: Less Accidents Since Using Cranberry Chews
customer_reviews.text: We inherited a little Chihuahua mix when my mother in law passed away. The dog originally came from the animal shelter and was puppy pad trained ... sort of. Anyhow, she has less accidents after having started her on these chews. That helps because we are at work all day and don't crate her because we have other big dogs we don't crate. She also used to leak a little in her bed at night, and that has practically stopped since we've been giving her these chews.
customer_reviews.author: janeaustinfan

customer_reviews.title: They Work!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. My dog was frequently having accidents inside and when she would go, it was only a little bit. It also had a smell. Immediately started her on these and the smell went away the first week and no accidents after week two, she takes these daily now!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Moralez

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats has idiopathic cystitis, which causes bladder issues. This is by far the best treatment we've found for her. We put a scoop and some water in her wet food each evening, and she has no issues. A couple of times we've run out and she's suffering again within a week! It really does wonders!
customer_reviews.author: santi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do a thing....and you can't return it or get a refund
customer_reviews.text: My dog had the same bladder issue she suffering from last summer. My ex bought her a container of this product from a regular pet shop and it cleared up her problem. Now she been taking it for about a month at two per day instead of one and it's doing absolutely nothing for her and I'm not able to return it or get a refund either because that's just their policy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chewey
customer_reviews.text: My dog's been on cranberry supplement for years, without any UTIs. She started spitting out the chewable tablets she'd been on, so I switched to these chews. So far, snarfs them down like they're a treat. NaturVet's calming chews are the only such aid that's seemed effective for Katy, so i trust their cranberry supplement is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Slavens

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with a lid!
customer_reviews.text: Dog seems to like them. It did not come with a lid.. ??? Only the plastic covering. So that is very unfortunate I have to keep it in a Ziploc bag. Not sure if it was forgotten or it just doesn't come with it
customer_reviews.author: crystal Reyna

customer_reviews.title: he was acting funny and after a little research I was hoping this ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I thought my dog had a UTI, he was acting funny and after a little research I was hoping this would help with the symptoms. He's very picky about what he eats, but he liked the flavor of these. I don't know if he had a UTI or if he was just acting weird (which isn't all that unlike him) but he seemed to be feeling better. We don't give them to the dogs all the time, but I don't think it'd hurt to help their urinary tract every now and then. Especially since they enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: 15 yr old Jack Russell terrior
customer_reviews.text: He's on his third supply of these chews. Loves the taste. It took about 2 weeks before I noticed he was getting better. Now he's half done with the 3rd bottle and has been urinating in his bed, the floor all over the place! If the results had lasted, it would have been great!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my Bichons frequent UTIs!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize the Bichon breed was prone to frequent UTIs. So after 2-3 visits to the vet and seeing my dog suffering through painful UTIs and bleeding. I got this product and was skeptical at first. She's been on it for the last 10mos and has not had one single UTI. Now I've this product on regular subscription and am not going to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Jeena

customer_reviews.title: No more utis so far.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say for sure if these have prevented any more UTIs as we've been very careful with our dog and also addes apple cider vinegar to her water after her antibiotics were finished. But she likes these and at this price it was worth it for the extra precaution. I will say that a few days ago I thought I smelled some strong urine so I gave her a few of these and she's good now. So maybe they do work as a preventative measure.
customer_reviews.author: Puppy Family

customer_reviews.title: Cranberry Relief
customer_reviews.text: This product really worked for my dog. She had chronic urinary tract infections until I started giving her these. she's 35 pds and I give her one once a day. Within two or three days she started drinking more and peeing normally again. I have to hide it in some other food because she doesn't care for it by itself, but it's easy to disguise. I am very happy I took a chance on these before taking her back to the vet and spending another couple hundred dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Naturvet Cranberry Relief soft chew.
customer_reviews.text: We have a diabetic dog who constantly get UTI's so we thought we would give it a try. Honestly my hopes were not that high, but this product surprised me and the vet. She has not had an infection in two months. She gets it twice a day everyday. It's been a great thing for our dog to get less infections means less pain for her and less prescription medication too.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them and seems to help.
customer_reviews.text: Dog had recurring UTI's. Started giving her these as her treats (and spring water for drinking water) and haven't had a recurrence. Weather it was the water or the cranberry I can't tell but I'm not stopping either. Have purchased this brand twice.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C

customer_reviews.title: My picky eater LOVES this supplement
customer_reviews.text: My little old dog LOVES this “treat” and it seems to really help with her bladder control!
customer_reviews.author: jfree99

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: The plastic container was not sealed. I eventually found the scoop at the bottom as I emptied in the thrash. I would not digest a food or supplement that was not sealed nor would I give it to m dog.. Waste of money.. Put her back on human vitamins at least I know they are safe
customer_reviews.author: Judy N.

customer_reviews.title: Made BOTH my dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: They made both my dogs ill abt 6-8 hours after the treat. One is 4 months old and my other is 9. They were barfing and heaving all night it was awful. Will just stick to cranberry pills. Do not buy these. Most OTC cranberry supplements are safe for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: DoWondersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Cured a minor UTI in our small dog in a manner of weeks. She gets these only on the weekend now as maintenance. I don't go in for a lot of woo science and herbal remedies but cranberry really works for female urinary issues.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a great product!
customer_reviews.text: My biggest concern was if our cat would reject a spoonful of this on his food a day. Happy to report that it didn't interfere with his appetite and he didn't even seem to notice it (of course, this cat has the appetite of a competitive eater) :D. No urinary probs the whole time he's been on it, but in all fairness, we also changed diet up to all prescription wet food. Comes with a cute lil' scooper for measuring out product. Easy peesy. Just mixed a scoop of this with his food every day. This is basically just a fail safe for us to keep the lil' guys' urethra rockin and rollin'!
customer_reviews.author: d kem

customer_reviews.title: I feel my dog it has normalized
customer_reviews.text: My Maltese dog had surgery for bladder stones, because of a high concentration of minerals in the bladder and the cranberry helps balance the pH of the urine. She really likes the taste and for a year she has been with the natural cranberry and urine treatment very well. I feel it has normalized.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: Have used for years
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for my dog since she was a puppy (going on 5 now). She had frequent UTI's as a puppy and this is the only thing I have found that keeps them at bay. She gets 1 or 2 every morning with her dental chew. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Bec J.

customer_reviews.title: Great to Prevent Dog UTIs
customer_reviews.text: This product has kept my senior English Mastiff free of urinary tract infections for over a year. Prior to that, she was miserable when she got infections and we were having to place her on expensive and unpleasant antibiotics regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus Flower

customer_reviews.title: Packaging and shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Container opened during shipping (lid and saftey seal) spilling contents in shipping box that had no padding to secure product. It seams this could be easily avoidable. I decided to give this to my 15 yr. old dog anyway. He seems to have a little more mobility after a week but it may be too early to tell if it's really helping him. I will remain optimistic. Work on you shipping service NaturVet.
customer_reviews.author: Shoprat

customer_reviews.title: Great price and very affective
customer_reviews.text: I waited to give a review because I wasn’t sure how this product’s affectiveness would be and surprisingly it did the job. Saved me alot with veterinarian but would recommend to have the dog be seen by one to make absolutely sure
customer_reviews.author: Michael B Molinyawe

customer_reviews.title: My dog has less urinary tract problems now
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very prone to UTIs and I started giving her cranberry supplements a few years ago. These provide that cranberry as well as immune support and she has much less episodes of UTI issues. She also loves taking her "treat" everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Dog approves
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as a preventive. My dog has no known urinary issues. She sure loves the taste of them, so I will keep buying them. The health benefits make sense and plenty of good reviews, so good enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: buymethat

customer_reviews.title: Cat Tolerates It
customer_reviews.text: Best of all the cat will eat it mixed with her wet food. I think it is helping with bladder infection. After two rounds of antibiotics, I tried this. Cat took first 20 antibiotics ok but when vet said she still had some infection and prescribed 20 more pills, cat had had enough and either didn't swallow pill and spit out later or hid under bed all day and only came out briefly in the morning to eat and evening for wet food. I figured the stress on both of us was not helping her infection.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Dancer

customer_reviews.title: 5 star UTI fighter!!! Great product 100%
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have been feeding my 80 lb dog 2 chews in the morning and night for a week and her UTI is going away fairly quickly :) She had swelling on her private afrea and it started going down the next day. I am happy for sure and recommend these to anyone not wanting to go to the vet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Power Von' Strokin

customer_reviews.title: No potty breaks at 2am
customer_reviews.text: Our Westie is 14 years old and sometimes she has to pee during the middle of the night. These have drastically reduced that from happening. Typically we'll give her the treats for a few days and the potty breaks become less frequent. She loves them though
customer_reviews.author: briana

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Has worked for our dobbie. Was having trouble peeing and doctor had prescribed meds. Had gotten better and then again began having trouble going. Didn’t wanna have to pay another vet visit so tried this plus another uti otc liquid (liquid just for a day). So far it’s worked! Dobbie likes them and is always excited to have them.
customer_reviews.author: JBPD

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this product. Our baby is 13 years old and this helps her urinary tract stay on track. Good product. She also likes the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy-Marie Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Cured my cat's urinary issues!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with my cat's persistent urinary tract issues. Cleared them up in a week! Haven't had any issues since. LOTS of product and lasts a long time. Just sprinkle it on their food. My cats LOVE the taste and it's not hard at all to get them to take it. Sprinkle it on the food and they will eat it. You don't have to "give it" to them like medicine and that's what I like best. It also works. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for my English Bulldog
customer_reviews.text: Just five years ago, my senior citizen bulldog was suffering from chronic UTI's. The Vets had her on perpetual antibiotics and were saying that she was reaching the end of the line. I self-prescribed this supplement which she receives daily. We haven't had any issues since.... Many thanks to NaturVet
customer_reviews.author: William Z

customer_reviews.title: I'll never run out of this again!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these for 7 months now. I wasn't sure if they were working. I ran out and our American Staffordshire (female 2 yrs old) started peeing in the house again. When outside on a walk, she'd squat , very little urine would come out then squat every few feet. We noticed a huge difference. Now I make sure to not run out. I only wish it would help our other dog's (male) urine not burn the grass.
customer_reviews.author: J day

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: The only way to stop UTI. I have a disabled dog who use to have recurrent UTI. Since I give her this product she is going healthy and no infections all this year. I mix with peach yogurth and give her at night before go to bed and she loves it, I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders and pups enjoy the treat!
customer_reviews.text: Our older Mastiff has had bladder issues for almost a year. She has been on the NaturVet Cranberry for over a month and we have seen a vast improvement. Less accidents, no late night potty breaks and she loves them. Great product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: both of my dogs ate it, hesitant the first time, and take it as treats. Did clear up my boys uti with in a week (confirmed by my vet)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic pills
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these, think they are treats. I have 2 dogs that have had UTI issues and a senior dog that has trouble making it through the night without needing to go out. I give them one a day (most days, sometimes I forget) and I've seen no UTI issues and my old dog is sleeping through the nights for the first time in a year! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Throckmorton

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive for cranberry
customer_reviews.text: The price is a little high for these kinds of products in my opinion. For that reason I had to take a star away. But it does work very well. I have had 2 pugs in my life so far that had bladder stones & after the stones were removed or dissolved I kept them on this as maintenance. My first pug (male) never had another episode of stones again. My second pug (female) has been doing pretty well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Our elderly yellow lab was constantly getting UTI's. Every couple months for the last two years or so. The last one, so bad it almost killed her. I swore after that to do everything prevention related that I could. She takes this daily and probiotics as well from this same company and hasn't had one since March. Last month we switched away from dry food to 100% wet fresh pet food to help even further with her water intake. Everything's been perfect with this product. She eats it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Pascarellimom

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: My dog had gotten a UTI and was given antibiotics along with this product and he got better. Because of the meds he is on, I give this to him weekly now as a preventive and so far he has not gotten another infection.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my senior dog who was having an adverse reaction to a prescription allergy medication he used to be on. This product is very reasonable priced, lasts a long time, is easy to mix into his food and helped improve his urine functions - less frequently and a more complete bladder drain. This saved lots of money in vet bills and prescription costs, was well tolerated by my dog and no adverse effects.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Helped my 12 year old dog and will purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 12 year old dog who began to have small accidents. My dog has now been on the cranberry relief for 2 weeks. I started off with 2 chews in the morning and 2 chews in the evening. By day 10, i have noticed a huge difference. He is no longer trying to run to the door every hour to go. I figured I would try these for a couple weeks before rushing him into the vet and leaving my review. My dog has no problem with the flavor as he takes them without a problem. I am very thankful to see positive results with this product! Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ziven03

customer_reviews.title: Lola won’t even try it
customer_reviews.text: My little girl Lola Maltipoo occasionally has a uti so bought this hoping it will help. No matter how I try to give it to her she won’t have it. I crushed it mixing in her good. Tried hiding in cheese. She won’t do it. Ugghhhhh
customer_reviews.author: Mary Krieger Chalaire

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: My puppy got a UTI and it was suggested that I start giving him these to prevent them. He's not had one since I started him on these. He also thinks they're his nightly treat and gobbles them right up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for an awesome price and great product
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for an awesome price and great product. My dog loves this. She was getting urinary tract infections a lot for the past two years. So far so good. Praying this will keep her from getting one for a long time. it has been about 2 months now. Will keep ordering. The price went up a little. Hoping it wont go up anymore
customer_reviews.author: McpraiseJesus

customer_reviews.title: So far so good for recurring UTI in senior dog
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My dog loves the flavor and since she isn’t asking to go out all the time my guess is it’s helping her. She kept having back to back infections. She really does like the smell and flavor.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mcpherson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to dose - that is if your dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My dog is prone to urinary tract infections and my vet has recommended cranberry supplements to keep it under control. These chews are easy to give although my dog seems to both love and hate them - sometimes she will take them like a treat other times she won't touch it. I'm not sure if the formula has changed but she seems to love the last batch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived open and all over the box, I see this happening to other people what's the deal? Why are they not sealed, I would like another box, if not I am going to unsubscribe
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sabedra

customer_reviews.title: Sick
customer_reviews.text: I rea!my liked this product the first time. But this second order is causing my lil to vomit. I made sure it could not be anything else. But now I know that this is the cause.
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The wife and I were watching a friend's dog for the week and they mentioned that she had a UTI the night they dropped her off. We didn't want her to suffer so we ordered these and they cleared up the UTI by the second day. Will definitely purchase these for our dogs should we ever need them. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ric

product_meta.title: NaturVet – Cranberry Relief Plus Echinacea – Helps Support a Healthy Urinary Tract & Immune System
feature_bullets: Cranberry Relief Powder Plus Echinacea helps support a healthy urinary tract and overall bladder function.
Provides immune system support to help maintain your pup’s overall health.
Veterinarian formulated with Cranberry Extract, Echinacea, Vitamin C and Oregon Grape Root.
Please note: No Scoop Provided. Use whatever scoop method you prefer! For use in dogs and cats over the age of 6 weeks.
NASC, cGMP Compliant, Manufactured in the USA
